description: Active Directory user modification events. Captures changes to AD user objects including attribute changes, group membership modifications, and privilege changes.

columns.name: aid
columns.description: Agent ID - unique identifier for the domain controller

columns.name: cid
columns.description: Customer ID - unique identifier for the CrowdStrike tenant

columns.name: TargetUserName
columns.description: Username of the AD user being modified

columns.name: TargetUserSid
columns.description: SID of the AD user being modified

columns.name: SubjectUserName
columns.description: Username of the account making the modification

columns.name: SubjectUserSid
columns.description: SID of the account making the modification

columns.name: AttributeModified
columns.description: Name of the AD attribute that was modified

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: New value of the modified attribute

common_operations: Monitor modifications to privileged AD accounts
Track changes to sensitive AD attributes
